questions.question_text: Which of the following scenarios should trigger the completion of a privacy impact assessment (PIA)?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
New inter-organizational data flows involve sharing personal data between organizations, which can introduce risks related to data protection, compliance, and privacy breaches.

choices.A: New data retention and backup policies
choices.B: Updates to the enterprise data policy

questions.question_text: Which of the following is MOST important when creating a data retention policy?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
regulatory requirements dictate how long different types of data must be retained or when it must be securely deleted

questions.question_text: An online business posts its customer data protection notice that includes a statement indicating information is collected on how products are used, the content viewed, and the time and duration of online activities. Which data protection principle is applied?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
This principle ensures that personal data is collected, processed, and used in a lawful, transparent, and fair manner. By posting a customer data protection notice and informing users about the types of data being collected (such as product usage, content viewed, and activity duration), the organization is providing transparency to the customers. This aligns with the lawfulness and fairness principle because it ensures that users are aware of what data is being collected and can make informed decisions about using the service.

Selected Answer: C
C. Data use limitation
